FAQ.question: Q: What boards are compatible with the drop node?
FAQ.answer: A: The DropNode kit officially supports the ODROID C4 computer. This is because the ODROID C4 can power two hard drives over its USB ports directly. The Raspberry Pi 4 and all other versions of the Raspberry Pi will not work.

FAQ.question: Q: What can I do with it?
FAQ.answer: A: The DropNode is great for applications which require lots of storage. You can host a media server or personal cloud.

FAQ.question: Q: What software do you recommend?
FAQ.answer:
• YunoHost lets you easily install, setup and manage hundreds of open source apps on your DropNode.
  • Umbrel lets you run a personal Bitcoin and Lightning Network node, self-host open source apps, cut out the middlemen, and use Bitcoin to its full potential. For free.
  • Storj lets you rent your hard drive space and internet bandwidth to the public cloud. Earn crypto every month based on your usage.
  • Anything from this list of Awesome Self Hosted apps!
